price: 1. Heb jij (o Mohammed) hoe jouw Heer de metgezellen van de olifanten behandelde?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ كَيۡفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡفِيلِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: alam tara kayfa faʿala rabbuka bi-aṣḥābi al-fīli
